ABOUT ME

I'm a Software Engineer working remotely from Sheffield. I have a degree in Web Design and over 7 years of professional experience building web applications at scale.

Currently at Kraken Technologies (Octopus Energy Group), I build real-time communication systems using React, TypeScript, and XState. My work includes phone infrastructure, messaging platforms, and customer service tools used by thousands of agents daily.

Developing the Ink messaging platform and Storyline feature for customer timeline visualization. Over 2,100 commits across React/TypeScript frontend systems.
